member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Avalonia.AppBuilder.UseSubsystemsFromStartupDirectory
member.summary: Instructs the to use the best settings for the platform.

member.name: T:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader
member.summary: Loads assets compiled into the application binary.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The default assembly from which to load resm: assets for which no assembly is specified.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.SetDefaultAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Sets the default assembly from which to load assets for which no assembly is specified.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.Exists(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Checks if an asset with the specified URI exists.
member.param: A base URI to use if is relative.
member.returns: True if the asset could be found; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.Open(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Opens the asset with the requested URI.
member.param: A base URI to use if is relative.
member.returns: A stream containing the asset contents.
member.exception: The asset could not be found.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.OpenAndGetAssembly(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Opens the asset with the requested URI and returns the asset stream and the assembly containing the asset.
member.param: A base URI to use if is relative.
member.returns: The stream containing the resource contents together with the assembly.
member.exception: The asset could not be found.

member.name: M:Avalonia.Shared.PlatformSupport.AssetLoader.GetAssets(System.Uri,System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets all assets of a folder and subfolders that match specified uri.
member.param: Base URI that is used if is relative.
member.returns: All matching assets as a tuple of the absolute path to the asset and the assembly containing the asset
